edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster

Interface Cluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.davidsoergel.dsutils.Labellable<String>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatchCluster<T,H>, CentroidCluster<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCentroidCluster, AbstractCluster, AdditiveCentroidCluster, BasicBatchCluster, BasicCentroidCluster, BatchAdditiveCentroidCluster, HierarchicalCentroidCluster, HierarchicalExplicitCentroidCluster, KohonenSOMCell

    public interface Cluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>
extends com.davidsoergel.dsutils.Labellable<String>
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Soergel

    • Method Detail

      • add

        boolean add(T point)
        Add the given sample to this cluster. Does not automatically remove the sample from other clusters of which it is already a member.
        Parameters:
        point - the sample to add
        Returns:
        true if the point was successfully added; false otherwise

      • addAll

        boolean addAll(Cluster<T> point)
        Add all the samples in the given cluster to this cluster. Does not automatically remove the samples from other clusters of which they are already members.
        Parameters:
        point - the sample to add
        Returns:
        true if the point was successfully added; false otherwise

      • getDerivedLabelProbabilities

        com.davidsoergel.dsutils.collections.WeightedSet<String> getDerivedLabelProbabilities()
        Gets the probabilities of String labels. The labels need not be mutually exclusive, so the weights need not sum to one.

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the id
        Returns:
        the id

      • getN

        int getN()
        Returns the number of samples in this cluster
        Returns:
        the number of samples in this cluster

      • remove

        boolean remove(T point)
        Remove the given sample from this cluster.
        Parameters:
        point - the sample to remove
        Returns:
        true if the point was successfully removed; false otherwise (in particular, if the point is not a member of this cluster in the first place)

      • removeAll

        boolean removeAll(Cluster<T> point)
        Remove all the samples in the given cluster from this cluster.
        Parameters:
        point - the sample to add
        Returns:
        true if the point was successfully added; false otherwise

      • setDerivedLabelProbabilities

        void setDerivedLabelProbabilities(com.davidsoergel.dsutils.collections.ImmutableHashWeightedSet<String> derivedLabelProbabilities)
        Sets the probabilities of String labels. The labels need not be mutually exclusive, so the weights need not sum to one.
        Parameters:
        derivedLabelProbabilities - a WeightedSet giving the probabilities of String labels.

      • updateDerivedWeightedLabelsFromLocal

        void updateDerivedWeightedLabelsFromLocal()
        Copy the local label weights into the derived label weights.
